qas.question: The Museo Torres Garcia is located where?
The Museo Torres Garcia exhibits whose unusual portraits?
Who established The Museo Torres Garcia?
Manolita Pina Torres was the widow of who?

context: The Museo Torres García is located in <a0_0>the Old Town<a0_0/>, and exhibits <a1_0>Joaquín Torres García<a1_0/>'s unusual portraits of historical icons and cubist paintings akin to those of Picasso and Braque. The museum was established by <a2_0>Manolita Piña Torres<a2_0/>, the widow of <a3_0>Torres Garcia<a3_0/>, after his death in 1949. She also set up the García Torres Foundation, a private non-profit organization that organizes the paintings, drawings, original writings, archives, objects and furniture designed by the painter as well as the photographs, magazines and publications related to him.
